location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 14 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus reports a conversation he had had with the Imam of Muscat [Said bin Sultan al-Said] on the subject of his treaty with the British: the Imam was aware of the amicable relations between the two governments; did not wish to become an embrrassment to the British; and had supposed that the arrival of the expedition under Lieutenant-Colonel Lionel Smith in 1809 meant that he was under British protection.
